activities: Our product Shareworks provides automated, streamlined equity plan administration.  Shareworks is a global, cloud-enabled platform for recordkeeping, trade execution and reporting.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: Data is client/customer data around the processing and management of equity programs (stock options, shares, restricted shares etc).  In addition to this we maintain HR data for the employees of our clients that receive these equity awards.
privacyprograms: TRUSTe Trusted Cloud and EU Safe Harbor certification.
recoursemech: TRUSTe is our third party dispute mechanism and verification program
